content: A painter paints his pictures on canvas. But musicians paint their pictures on silence. We provide the music, and you provide the silence.
translations: ita:Un pittore dipinge il suo quadro su una tela. Ma i musicisti dipingono i loro quadri sul silenzio. Noi forniamo la music
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
